price: I kao Kur’an, sve dio po dio ga objavljujemo da bi ga ti ljudima malo-pomalo kazivao, i prema potrebi ga objavljujemo.
arabic: وَقُرۡءَانٗا فَرَقۡنَٰهُ لِتَقۡرَأَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ عَلَىٰ مُكۡثٖ وَنَزَّلۡنَٰهُ تَنزِيلٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqur'ānan faraqnāhu litaqra-ahu ʿalā al-nāsi ʿalā muk'thin wanazzalnāhu tanzīlan
